text: Live Motion Games   tell us your ideas feedback for our projects and earn yourself a free game  Hello everyone   We are  Live Motion Games    a game developer from Poland based in Warsaw As we try to reach out as many people with our projects as we can we decided to post here  after getting a permission from mods   thank you  and say hello   That s not the only thing though   as we work on several projects we are always on the lookout for two main things   ideas  that we could implement in our games and  feedback  regarding what we have already achieved   We would love to hear your opinions and ideas for games that we are currently developing   Chernobyl Liquidators Simulator   Builder Simulator   Builders of China  and  Supermarket Manager    You can check all our games  right here https store steampowered com developer livemotiongames    scroll down and select upcoming releases to see games that we are currently working on  We recommend checking their devlogs to see what we already have and check trailers for the games   amp x B If you have any idea  for example what would you like to see in the game  feedback or remark  something should be changed  perhaps  regarding our games   we would love to hear them   What is more   we have a little treat for you too   Four of you  with ideas suggestions or feedback that we deem to be the most valuable for us will receive a free Steam key for our  Train Station Renovation    a relaxing game about repairing and renovating train stations  bringing them back to their former glory   Thank you very much for the chance  If you have any questions we are also very open and would gladly answer them  Cheers
summary: Live Motion Games is a game developer from Poland based in Warsaw. They are looking for feedback for their games Chernobyl Liquidators Simulator Builder Simulator Builders of China and Supermarket Manager. Four people with the most valuable feedback will receive a free Steam key for Train Station Renovation.
cleaned: live motion game game developer poland base warsaw look feedback game chernobyl liquidators simulator builder simulator builder china supermarket manager people valuable feedback receive free steam key train station renovation

text: Yes  we are gamers too  I ve seen posts and comments saying that Nintendo gamers or people who don t play as many hours aren t considered as gamers  Like  are you stupid Nintendo is a gaming company too  that makes their own consoles  that makes their own games  and is Nintendo gamers aren t actually gamers If you were to define what a gamer is  it would be a person who plays video games  so what s wrong with Nintendo  They re a gaming company too All my life  I only owned Nintendo consoles  and I definitely consider myself a gamer  I ve played hundreds of hours playing these lovely games  and they ve changed my life But apparently Nintendo gamers aren t actually gamers because their games don t have enough action  or they don t have the best graphics  For fucks sake  just admit our games are different and move on If you like horror games  you re a gamer  If you like action games  you re a gamer  If you like open world games  you re a gamer  But if you like peaceful and family games  you re not If you criticise someone for using a Nintendo console  Satan is a big fan of you  because you can t accept that people like things that you re not interested in   So sit down  shut up  and play some Animal Crossing  because that will calm you down
summary: There are some people criticising Nintendo gamers, saying that they are not gamers because they don't play as many hours or because their games don't have enough action or have the best graphics. I used to own Nintendo consoles and I consider myself to be a gamer.
